name: Awesome Lightbox
author: galaxyweblinks

sections.description:
This plugin is allow to create the optimized video lightbox block.

“Our WordPress plugin utilizes the Glightbox and Plyr libraries to enhance media viewing and playback functionalities.”

For any Feedback and Queries please contact at vivek.jha@galaxyweblinks.in
sections.installation:
1. Log in and navigate to _Plugins → Add New.
  2. Type “Awesome Lighgtbox into the Search and hit Enter.
  3. Locate the Awesome Lightbox plugin in the list of search results and click Install Now.
  4. Once installed, click the Activate link.

It can also be installed manually.

  1. Download the Awesome Lightbox plugin from WordPress.org.
  2. Unzip the package and move to your plugins directory /wp-content/plugins/awesome-lightbox.
  3. Log into WordPress and navigate to the Plugins screen.
  4. Locate Awesome Lightbox in the list and click the Activate link.
sections.faq:
How we can add the Awesome Video Lighgtbox

To add the Awesome Video Lighgtbox in your gutunberg page editor just search the Awesome Video Lighgtbox and add the block.

How we can update the poster image?

We can update the poster image from the right side toolbar after adding the Awesome Video Lighgtbox block.
